item.title: In Place Upgrade Your Windows Server Azure VM: Step by Step Guide
item.description: In Place Upgrade Your Windows Server Azure VM: Step by Step Guide Upgrading your Windows Server Azure VM to a newer version can seem daunting, but with the right steps, it can be a smooth process. This guide will walk you through a step-by-step process, complete with visuals, to upgrade your Windows VM in Azure, for instance, from WS 2016 to 2019. Prerequisites for a Successful Upgrade Before diving into the upgrade, ensure the following prerequisites are met:
